attributes.action: acknowledge that membership of the EU hinders control of immigration and job creation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the Govt's recent response to Robert Dennell's petition on the need for a referendum on the Reform treaty it was claimed that membership of the EU enabled us to deal effectively with issues such as migration and job creation. In fact membership of the EU means we are not able to control our own borders and unlimited immigration from the EU is possible . Additionally EU red tape and regulation is imposing hugh financial burdens on UK industry and making us far less competitive with overseas countries so that jobs are being transferred abroad

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
